alert.note: Alert for Live Oak (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Corpus Christi (Corpus Cristi, Victoria and Laredo)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued May 22 at 7:07AM CDT until May 23 at 5:00AM CDT by NWS Corpus Christi
info.description: ...The National Weather Service in Corpus Christi TX has issued a Flood Warning for the following river in Texas... Atascosa River at Whitsett affecting Live Oak County. For the Atascosa River...including Whitsett...Minor flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT UNTIL THIS AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Atascosa River at Whitsett. * WHEN...Until this afternoon. * IMPACTS...at 20.0 feet, minor lowland flooding reaches the lowest areas of crop and pastureland. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 6:15 AM CDT Monday, the stage was 19.9 feet. - Forecast...The river will rise above flood stage late this morning, crest near 20.1 feet mid afternoon, then fall below flood stage late this afternoon. - Flood stage is 20.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood && Below are the latest river stages and stage forecasts: Fld Observed Forecasts (7 am) Location Stg Stg Day/Time Tue Wed Thu Fri Sat Atascosa River Whitsett 20.0 19.9 Mon 6 am 14.7 6.2 5.0 4.0 3.3 &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Stay tuned to further developments by listening to your local radio, television, or NOAA Weather Radio for further information. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov/crp.
